definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: royalty, royal power, reign, kingdom (chiefly late);—´[[מ]] abs. Es 1:9 +; cstr. 1Ch 12:23 +; sf. [[מַלְכוּתִי]] 1Ch 17:14, etc.; pl. [[מַלְכֻיּוֹת]] Da 8:22; —

royal power, dominion Nu 24:7 (c. [[תִּנַשֵּׂא]]), 1Sa 20:31 (c. [[תִּכּוֹן]]), 1Ki 2:12 (c. id.); cf. Je 10:7, Ec 4:14; 1Ch 11:10, 1Ch 12:23, 1Ch 29:30 (‖[[גְּבוּרָה]]), 2Ch 33:13, Es 1:19, royal (queenly) dignity Es 4:14; 1Ch 14:2 (c. [[נִשֵּׂאת]]); c. [[לָכַד]] Da 11:21; c. [[הֵכִין]] (subj. ´[[י]]) 1Ch 17:11, 1Ch 28:7; 2Ch 12:1 (subj. Rehob.); Isr. royalty as belonging to ´[[י]] 1Ch 17:14; dominion of ´[[י]] Ps 103:l9 (c. [[מָֽשְׁלָה]]), Ps 145:13, Ps 145:13; ´[[כְּבוֹד מ]] v:Ps 145:11; ´[[כְּבוֹד הֲדַר מ]] v:Ps 145:12; ´[[שֵׁבֶט מ]] Ps 45:7; ´[[כִּסֵּא מ]] 1Ch 22:10, 1Ch 28:5, 2Ch 7:18; of Pers. Es 1:2, Es 5:1; ´[[בַּיִת לְמ]] 2Ch 1:18, 2Ch 2:11; ´[[בֵּית מ]] Es 1:9, Es 2:16, Es 5:1 (cf. As. bit sûarruti Dl:HWB 171); ´[[יֵין מ]] royal wine Es 1:7; ´[[דְּבַר מ]] royal command Es 1:19; ´[[הוֹד מ]] royal honour, majesty 1Ch 29:25, Da 11:21; so perh. also ´[[הֶדֶר מ]] Da 11:20 v. Bev; ´[[עשֶׁר בְּבוֹד מ]] Es 1:4; ´[[כֶּתֶר מ]] royal crown Es 1:11, Es 2:17, Es 6:8; ´[[לְבוּשׁ מ]] royal apparel Es 6:8, Es 8:15; ´[[מ]] ([[לְבוּשׁ]] om.) Es 5:l (queenly attire).

reign: 40th year of reign of David 1Ch 26:31 cf. 2Ch 3:2, 2Ch 15:10, 2Ch 15:19, 2Ch 16:1, 2Ch 16:12, 2Ch 35:19, Je 49:34, Da 1:1; also 2Ch 29:19; of Babyl. and Pers. kings Je 52:31 (´[[בִּשְׁנַת מ]] ‖ 2Ki 25:27 [[מָלְכוֹ]]) Da 2:1, Da 8:1, Ezr 4:5, Ezr 4:6, Ezr 4:6, Ezr 7:1, Ezr 8:1, Ne 12:22, Es 2:16; cf. [[עַד־מְלֽח מַלְכוּת פָּרָס]] 2Ch 36:20.

kingdom, realm 2Ch 1:1, 2Ch 11:17, 2Ch 20:30, Ne 9:35; esp. realm of Babyl. and Pers. 2Ch 36:22 = Ezr 1:1, Es 1:14, Es 1:20, Es 2:3, Es 3:6, Es 3:8, Es 5:3, Es 5:6, Es 7:2, Es 9:30, Da 8:22, Da 9:1, Da 10:13; cf. Da 11:2, Da 11:4, Da 11:4, Da 11:9, Da 11:17, v:Da 11:20 ´[[הֶדֶר מ]] = Jerus. acc. to Hi., but v.
